# Question

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceed. Provide an example

```julia
function wrap_string(input_string::String, text_width::Int=10)::String
    words = split(input_string)
    output = ""
    line_length = 0
    for word in words
        if line_length + length(word) > text_width
            output *= "\n$word "
            line_length = length(word) + 1
        else
            output *= "$word "
            line_length += length(word) + 1
        end
    end
    return output
end
```

Example:
```julia
input_string = "This is a sample sentence to demonstrate line wrapping functionality."
wrapped_string = wrap_string(input_string, 20)
println(wrapped_string)
```
